name: jjdl
description: jjdl-js: A simple text download program.

scripts.lib: browserify -o dist/lib.js -r buffer -r path -r url -r jquery -r jsdom -r request -r request-promise-native
scripts.pack: browserify -o dist/jjdl_core.js -x buffer -x path -x url -x jquery -x jsdom -x request -x request-promise-native dist/jjdl.js
scripts.pack_upgrade: browserify -o dist/upgrade.js -x buffer -x path -x url -x jquery -x jsdom -x request -x request-promise-native dist/tool/upgrade.js
